name: Super Metroid: Temple of the Winds
overview: Foreseeing a future disaster, the Chozo have sent you to an ancient temple to recover the artifacts there as the next stage of your training. One-region exploration/puzzle hack focusing on using new items to overcome challenges. This is the first hack of 'A Hunter Born' series It is meant to be used with the attached manual, if you so choose, which has some additional background content. Manual is recommended due to custom items and some new things old abilities can do now.
